name: Cheater (roke)
description:
Cheater is a short action platform game where you introduce  "code" to enable the functions of the game. 

  As the theme for LDJAM 45 was "Start with nothing",  we had the idea of "coding" your own game from nothing. That is why the game starts with NOTHING but a rudimentary interface. An AI will help you with some advice about what to code and in some cases do the coding for you.

  Once you familiarized with the game, you can play with the mechanics of the game and aim for a high score.

Instructions

  • Enter  -> Input ON/OFF
  • Arrows -> Movement

List of Commands

So here a list of commands you can use to make the game more challenging.

  • /map - Generates map.
  • /player - Generates Player.
  • /move - Enables movement.
  • /jump - Enables jump.
  • /attack - Enables attacks.
  • /enemies - Randomly spawns all kind of enemies.
  • /game over – Takes you to the game over screen.
  • /music - Starts music.
  • /reset - Restart the game.
  • /infinite lives - Gives you infinite lives.
  • /random - In a determined amount of time one of the actions randomly turns off and on.
  • /virus - Mixes the controls (Left = right).
  • /all commands –Activates all commands.
  • /chaos – More enemies are spawn and the re-spawn delay becomes shorter.
  • /shut down – Closes the game.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/untitled-game
